@roblox/global/Path.documentation: Constructs a new filesystem path representation.

@roblox/global/Vec2.documentation:
Constructs a new 2-dimensional vector.
{x: number or 0, y: number or 0}

@roblox/global/Vec3.documentation:
Constructs a new 3-dimensional vector.
{x: number or 0, y: number or 0, z: number or 0}

@roblox/global/Mat3.documentation:
Constructs a new 3-by-3 matrix.
default element value: 0

@roblox/global/Color.documentation:
Constructs a new color.
{r: [0, 255] or 0, g: [0, 255] or 0, b: [0, 255] or 0, a: [0, 255] or 255}

@roblox/global/fs.documentation: a wrapper around the std::filesystem C++ standard library.

@roblox/global/engine.keydown.documentation: the callback for engine's keydown event
